q: first day senators are allowed to officially submit legislation, David Vitter reintroduced his bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to prohibit family planning grants from being awarded to entities that perform abortions. My Title X amendment would end the practice of allowing taxpayer funds to be used to pay for administrative costs and other services offered by abortion providers, a practice that allows other funds to be used for abortion practices, he told LifeNews.com. ,... Barack Obama to run for president in 2012 Washington, January 21: US Barack Obama has planned to run for a second term in office for the 2012 presidential election despite his low popularity.
